sentences.english: "Remind Me, " the new single from the album, features Carrie Underwood.
sentences.chinese: “提醒我”的新單曲的專輯，功能凱莉安德伍德。

sentences.english: Famous photographer Annie Leibovitz took the photo for the release of this single on the same day Lennon was murdered.
sentences.chinese: 單曲封面的照片就是在列儂被殺當天拍攝的。

sentences.english: Side two contains four once and future hit singles.
sentences.chinese: 第二面有四首持續走紅的單曲。

sentences.english: The group has sold more than 80 million albums and singles.
sentences.chinese: 這支樂隊共售出超過8000萬張專輯和單曲唱片。

sentences.english: The collection includes all the band's British and American hit singles.
sentences.chinese: 專輯中收錄了該樂隊在英國和美國的所有熱門單曲。

sentences.english: However, the single also caused controversy7 in society.
sentences.chinese: 不過，這支單曲也在社會上引起了爭議。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a practical case of demolishing two reinforced concrete single-curvature arch bridges by using controlled blasting.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了兩座鋼筋混凝土單曲拱橋的控制爆破拆除工藝。

sentences.english: You do not doubt that some of his singles .
sentences.chinese: 你不用懷疑那一定是他的單曲。

sentences.english: Kids" is the third single from MGMT's album Oracular Spectacular."
sentences.chinese: “孩子”是MGMT的第三支單曲的專輯玄妙壯觀。

sentences.english: The first single from the album, Deeper Understanding, is now on YouTube.
sentences.chinese: 專輯的第一支單曲《深入瞭解》已可在油管上收聽。

sentences.english: The list has been around since 1958 and evidently it is here to stay.
sentences.chinese: 公告牌單曲排行榜始於1958年並一直延續至今。

sentences.english: Kylie accepted the advice and went on to record the single.
sentences.chinese: 剴莉接受了這個提議，錄製了這首歌的單曲。

sentences.english: Within six months sheet-music sales topped half a million copies.
sentences.chinese: 不到6個月，單曲銷售量就達到了50萬張。

sentences.english: I think we need CDs for albums, not for singles.
sentences.chinese: 專輯可以使用CD，但是單曲就不需要了。

sentences.english: It has all the makings of a hit single.
sentences.chinese: 它具有成爲熱門單曲的素質。

sentences.english: "I don't believe in releasing a single and then just watching it. " - Lady Gaga to NME magazine.
sentences.chinese: 我無法相信有人發行了單曲，然後就在旁邊納涼。

definition: album/record (music)/special collection of printed or broadcast material
to compose a poem (to a given tune)
A-Mei, aka Gulilai Amit (1972-), aboriginal Taiwanese pop singer
